# Stalkeer Documentation Instructions

## Purpose

- Provided open-source documentation for the Stalkeer project.
- Ensure documentation is clear, concise, and up-to-date.
- Include parts: Getting Started, Usage Guide, Configuration, Developer Guide

## Technologies

- Use Docusaurus for documentation site generation.
- Use Markdown for writing documentation content.
